hanzi-su-wiki:
帰

Значения

Возвращаться; подчиняться, сводиться к чему-нибудь

Мнемоника

  • Возвращение к родителям замужней женщины 帚. Нож 刂 есть символ чрезвычайности причин, на основе которых муж вправе выгнать жену.

  • Ласточки возвращаются в свои гнёзда.

Варианты

歸, 归, 皈
purpleculture_pinyin:
guī
Japanese variant of 归
Японский вариант го
rtega_mnemonic:
歸歸RS
归归		帰return, return to, revert to
  • man with sword 刂 turning back to his housewife 帚
  • man sent 追 back to his housewife 帚
  • ⓢ sword 刂 and hand 手 remain
復 戻 返 還 歸

帰帰RS
X		return home, send home
  • husband, represented by the sword 刂, returning to his wife 帚
復 戻 返 還
heisig_constituent: homecoming, sword, spear, cutlass, feather duster, broom, apron, crown, towel
heisig_story: Spear . . . broom . . . apron. The character for lady (Frame 1234) shares the same right side as this character, which does not bode for a very happy homecoming.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: homecoming, arrive at, lead to, result in
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: возвращение на родину, прийти, привести к, привести к
koohiiStory1: A female warrior returns home from battle. Her husband takes away her spear to symbolize the end of fighting and gives her a broom and an apron. “Boy, this is some kind of HOMECOMING,” thinks the veteran. (Adapted from johnskb).
koohiiStory2: Well, the boss man warrior upon his homecoming has set aside his spear. Remember the lady (#1151) (who put aside her broom and apron)? I wonder what they´re doing now?
kunYomi: かえ.る、かえ.す、おく.る、とつ.ぐ
jp_example_words:
帰す(かえす): to send back
帰京(ききょう): returning to Tokyo
帰宅(きたく): returning home
日帰り(ひがえり): day trip
帰り(かえり): return (noun)
帰る(かえる): go back, go home, come home, return
jp_readingExamples: 帰す (かえ.す), 帰る (かえ.る)
WaniKani_Radicals: 刂, ヨ, 冖, 巾
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A knife got stuck in Wolverine's forehead, and he has a towel wrapped around it to stop the bleeding, but he really needs to return home.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Everything is fun and games until someone gets hurt. And in this case, very hurt. If something like this happens, it's always best to return home.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Wolverine wants to return home, but he can't drive himself because there's a knife in his forehead and lots of blood, so he asks his friend the car elephant (かえ) to take him. Car elephant is just an elephant mutant that has a car on his back.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Watch as Wolverine climbs up onto car elephant and returns home. Well, this party was a failure.
Ru_Meaning: homecoming, arrive at, lead to, result in
Ru_Radicals: 冖 (ва), 刈 (косить), 巾 (тряпка), ヨ
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you have a sword (刂) and a broom (帚) but you return them

帰字的基本解释

帰
guī
古同“归”。

帰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guī］
同“歸1”。
《宋元以来俗字谱》：“歸”，《取经诗话》、《通俗小说》、《古今杂剧》等作“帰”。
[②]［kuì］
义未详。

帰字的康熙字典解释
帰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
帰字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guī］
Same as "Return to 1".
"Song and Yuan Dynasties": "Gui", "Gui", "Popular Novels", "Ancient and Modern Zaju" and other works "Gui".
[②]［kuì］
The meaning is unclear.

guī
яп. вм. 归

帰

Значения

Возвращаться; подчиняться, сводиться к чему-нибудь

Мнемоника

  • Возвращение к родителям замужней женщины 帚. Нож 刂 есть символ чрезвычайности причин, на основе которых муж вправе выгнать жену.

  • Ласточки возвращаются в свои гнёзда.

Варианты

歸, 归, 皈

Radicals: 刂, ヨ, 冖, 巾  (knife, wolverine, forehead, towel)
Meaning Mnemonic
A knife got stuck in Wolverine's forehead, and he has a towel wrapped around it to stop the bleeding, but he really needs to return home.
Everything is fun and games until someone gets hurt. And in this case, very hurt. If something like this happens, it's always best to return home.
Reading Mnemonic
Wolverine wants to return home, but he can't drive himself because there's a knife in his forehead and lots of blood, so he asks his friend the car elephant (かえ) to take him. Car elephant is just an elephant mutant that has a car on his back.
Watch as Wolverine climbs up onto car elephant and returns home. Well, this party was a failure.
